page.title: 09FARMS ON THE S.DOWNS (cont.)
page.content: Newhouse Farm (sq.11) is also surrounded by cultivated fields. It is an attractive flint farmhouse & belongs to Goodwood Estate. It is farmed by a tenant farmer, Mr. Humphrey. There are no farm buildings belonging to Hillbarn Farm in this block. At Broadham House there are stonebuilt barns & stables near the ouse, & a stone & tile barn in one of the fields where there used also to be two cottages, which have now been pulled down. At Newhouse Farm there are several old & some new farm buildings & further on are two open sided & one closed barn full of hay & marked on the map as Pond Barn.
